title: Calories in 12 Cups of Strawberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 12 c strawberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per cup basis with tweaks.
assumptions: Fresh, whole strawberries; 1 cup â‰ˆ 152 g; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, size, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 12 cups of fresh strawberries provide ~588 kcal and ~36 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 12 c strawberries?
faqs.a: Approximately 588 kcal for 12 cups of fresh whole strawberries.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 12 cups of strawberries?
faqs.a: About 140 g total carbs, with 36 g fiber and 89 g natural sugars.

faqs.q: Are strawberries low calorie for 12 cups?
faqs.a: Yes, ~49 kcal per cup makes 12 cups a low-calorie fruit option at 588 kcal.

faqs.q: How much fiber in 12 c strawberries?
faqs.a: Roughly 36 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Does preparation affect calories in strawberries?
faqs.a: Slicing or adding sugar increases calories; frozen unsweetened is similar to fresh.
